STATE v. BENSON. No. COA05-1562. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed September 5, 2006. Certification Date September 25, 2006. Appeal from New Hanover (03CRS20455, 03CRS20456, 03CRS20457, 03CRS20458, 03CRS20459, 03CRS20460, 04CRS66838, 04CRS66884, 04CRS66885, 04CRS66886, 04CRS66919, 04CRS66922).

Case reported without published opinion. No error.
